description: Demolition of majority of existing buildings; refurbishment of retained buildings: change of use of retained buildings to purposes with Classes A1  A2  A3 or B1 at ground and basement levels and Class B1 on upper floors; and construction of new buildings all for Class B1 purposes except at ground and basement floors on Cowcross Street frontage where use to be for Class A1 or A2 or B1 PROPOSED PLANS:PA/340B 341 342 343 350 351A 352A 353A 355A 356A 357A 358A 359A 360A 361A 362A 363A 365 366 367 368 371 372 373 374 375 376 377 378 380 381 382B 383B 384 385A 386A 387A 388A 389A 390A 391A.
decision_conditions: WITHDRAWN FOLLOWING REVIEW OF RECORDS SEE DECISIONS ON 89/0046 & 89/0057
